spec_data.Name: python2-bitlyapi
spec_data.Description:
This is a thin Python wrapper for the bit.ly API.  Basic usage looks
like this:

    >>> import bitlyapi
    >>> b = bitlyapi.BitLy(api_user, api_key)
    >>> res = b.shorten(longUrl='http://www.google.com/')
    >>> print(res['url'])
    'http://bit.ly/6Hwstb'
    >>> print(res['long_url'])
    'http://www.google.com/'
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sat 29 Jul 2017 12:01:27 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: A thin python wrapper for the bit.ly REST API
